description: Set up the wiring to the webhook server

version.description: the version of the config file

endpoints.description: List of endpoints to accept requests on. The request body will be parsed according to the type

name.description: A unique name for this endpoint

path.description: The url path segment to receive events on

type.description: The type of the endpoint determines how events are parsed

requiredHeaders.description: Optional list of required header key-value pairs. Request without the header to this endpoint are denied

repositories.description: List of repositories to be used by subscriptions

name.description: A unique name for this endpoint

provider.description: The git provider. If not set, it is inferred

username.description: The basic auth username used to authenticate against the upstream git server

password.description: The basic auth password used to authenticate against the upstream git server

subscriptions.description: Subscribe with repositories to events received via the configured endpoints

name.description: A unique name for this subscription

branch.description: The branch of the referenced repository to operate on

strategy.description: The strategy determines if a pull request will be opened or a direct commit against the configured branch is peformed

repositoryRef.description: A reference to a repository. The name must be one of the configured repository names in this config

endpointRefs.description: A list of reference to a endpoint. The name must be one of the configured endpoint names in this config

scopes.description: An optional list of paths to to operate on. If no path is provided, kobold will operate on the entire branch filetree

fileAssociations.description: optional mappings to associate file types with resolvers

pattern.description: glob pattern to match file name

kind.description: resolver to use when the pattern is matched

registryAuth.description: can be used to access image pull secrets when using the k8schain flag

namespace.description: the service account and image pull secrets are looked up in this namespace

serviceAccount.description: Image pull secrets attached to this service account are used for the key chain

imagePullSecrets.description: Image pull secrets attached to this service account are used for the key chain

name.description: the name of the image pull secret

commitMessage.description: the git commit message to use

title.description: a short or summary title for this commit message. Can be a go template

description.description: a longer multiline body for this message it is automatically seperated from the title by an empty line. Can be a go template

paths.description: List of paths to search for image refs. Does not stop on first match
